00028 RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlAttributeList::xmlAttributeList(){
00029   LOGI("Creates xmlAttributeList");
00030   refresh();
00031 }
00032 
00039 bool RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlAttributeList::refresh(){
00040   LOGI("xmlAttrbibuteList refresh function called");
00041   bool ret;
00042 
00043   GlobalURI gu;
00044   //  const char* filename=;
00045   //  const char* filename="http://127.0.0.1/rpg/persoattrb.xml";
00046   CurlFileToXml cgf;
00047   cgf.setFilename(gu.getXmlAdress("persoattrb.xml"));
00048   bool success= cgf.perform();
00049 
00050   if (success){
00051     if (loadDocument(&cgf)){
00052       ret=true;
00053     }
00054     else{
00055       ret=false;
00056       correctlyLoaded=false;
00057     }
00058   }
00059   else{
00060     long resp=cgf.getServerResponse();
00061     LOGE("An error occured while getting xmlAttrbibuteList");
00062     cout << "Last server response : " << resp << endl;
00063     correctlyLoaded=false;
00064     ret=false;
00065   }
00066 
00067   return ret;
00068 }

00075 RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlAttributeList::~xmlAttributeList(){
00076   doc=NULL;
00077   root=NULL;
00078 }
00079 
00091 bool RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlAttributeList::loadDocument(
00092                                          CurlFileToXml* cgf){
00093 
00094   doc=cgf->getXmlDocument();
00095   if (doc){
00096     root =doc->RootElement();
00097     correctlyLoaded=true;
00098     LOGI("xmlAttributeList correctly loaded"); 
00099     return true;
00100   }
00101   else{
00102     correctlyLoaded=false;
00103     LOGW("An error occured while getting xmlAttributeList");
00104     return false;
00105   }
00106 }
00107 
00113 RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::tAttributeList* RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::
00114                                   xmlAttributeList::getAttributeList(){
00115 
00116   if (correctlyLoaded){
00117 
00118     tAttributeList* pl= new tAttributeList();
00119     
00120     TiXmlHandle docHandle( doc );
00121     TiXmlElement* child = docHandle.FirstChild( "PersoAttributes" )
00122       .FirstChild( "Attribute" ).Element();
00123     
00124     for( child; child; child=child->NextSiblingElement() ){
00125       
00126       tAttributeListItem* it=new tAttributeListItem();
00127       
00128       it->name  = getXMLTextFromName(child, "Name");
00129       it->cat   = getXMLTextFromName(child, "Cat");
00130       it->type  = getXMLTextFromName(child, "Type");
00131       it->param1= getXMLTextFromName(child, "Param1");
00132       it->param2= getXMLTextFromName(child, "Param2");
00133       it->desc  = getXMLTextFromName(child, "Desc");
00134       
00135       pl->push_back(it);
00136     }
00137     return pl;
00138   }
00139   else{
00140     LOGE("Cannot get attribute list, document not loaded");
00141     return NULL;
00142   }
00143 }
00144 
00153 const char* RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlAttributeList::
00154                 getXMLTextFromName(TiXmlElement*child, const char* nodeName){
00155 
00156   TiXmlText* textNode;
00157 
00158   TiXmlNode* node=child->FirstChild(nodeName);
00159   if (node && node->FirstChild()){
00160     textNode=node->FirstChild()->ToText();
00161     if (textNode)
00162       return  textNode->Value();
00163     
00164     else  // !textNode
00165       return  "";
00166   }
00167   else    // !node
00168     return  "";
00169 }

00179 RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::tAttributeListItem* RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::
00180               xmlAttributeList::getAttribute(const char* attrbName){
00181 
00182   bool found=false;
00183 
00184   tAttributeList::const_iterator iter;
00185 
00186   tAttributeList* pl=this->getAttributeList();
00187   
00188   if (pl){
00189     for (iter=pl->begin(); iter != pl->end(); iter++){
00190 
00191       // We have the good category
00192       if (strcmp(attrbName, (*iter)->name )==0){
00193         found=true;
00194         return (*iter);
00195 
00196       }
00197     }
00198   }
00199 
00200   if (!found)
00201     return NULL;
00202 }
